meta.title: SVG Extractor - Extract & Download SVGs from Any Website
meta.description: Free online tool to extract, preview and download all SVG icons and graphics from any website. Download individually or as a ZIP archive.
meta.keywords: svg extractor, download svg, extract svg from website, svg downloader, svg icons, web scraper svg

hero.title: Extract SVGs from any website
hero.subtitle: Paste a URL and instantly extract all SVG graphics. Preview them, download individually, or grab them all at once.

results.none: No SVGs found on this page
results.noneSub: Try a different URL or check that the page uses SVG graphics.

errors.fetch_failed: Failed to fetch the page. Please check the URL and try again.
